context.description: Represents conditional criteria used for context matching. Keys define dimension names and values specify the criteria that must be met.
context.title: Condition

override.description: Configuration overrides that replace default values when context conditions are met. Keys represent configuration keys and values are the override data.
override.title: Overrides
